report.title: Top level samples list for a warehouse user
report.description: A general purpose list of top level samples filtered according to the ID of the user as registered on the warehouse. Top level means that the parent_id field of the samples is null.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.deleted=false AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND s.created_by_id=#user_id# AND su.website_id in (#website_ids#)

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
param.join: JOIN termlists_terms ttl1 ON ttl1.id=s.sample_method_id INNER JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id and ttl2.id=#sample_method_id#
